title: Mobile Microlearning for Behavior Modification Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A course focused on acquiring behavior modification techniques applicable in real-world work settings by current practitioners. Incorporates CAPSI-based self-directed learning and peer evaluation systems.

learning_goals: Learners can explain behavior modification theory with over 80% accuracy using the CAPSI system.
Learners can analyze real-world cases and develop action plans applying behavior reinforcement and extinction strategies.
Learners can achieve over 90% accuracy in analyzing behavior modification cases through peer assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
